sentence: They include Rep. Ted Budd, a little-known congressman running for a Senate seat who won a surprise endorsement from Trump, and Rep. Madison Cawthorn, who continues to have Trump's support even though he has faced backlash from members of his own party over various recent incendiary comments.
author: Editors
title: Ukraine evacuations, Trump rally, weekend at the Masters: 5 things to know this weekend

sentence: Speakers at the rally include North Carolina Representatives Madison Cawthorn, Dan Bishop and Greg Murphy.
author: Xander Landen
title: How to Watch Trump North Carolina Rally: Time, Live Stream for Selma Speech
